mapper.select:
SELECT b.id, b.person_id, b.name, b.publisher, b.publish_date, b.isbn, b.remark, rp.emp_no AS empNo, rp.name AS personName FROM research_book b LEFT JOIN research_person rp ON rp.id = b.person_id
AND b.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND b.person_id = #{personId}
ORDER BY b.id DESC
SELECT id, person_id, name, publisher, publish_date, isbn, remark FROM research_book WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO research_book(person_id, name, publisher, publish_date, isbn, remark) VALUES (#{personId}, #{name}, #{publisher}, #{publishDate}, #{isbn}, #{remark})
